alert.note: Alert for North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 11:10PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lincoln County through 1145 PM MDT... At 1109 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Arriba, or 16 miles northwest of Flagler, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Lincoln County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County
